name: Drones... The Rooms
description:
A Strategy and Survival game, Drones... The Rooms offers you, the players, a rare experience. Multitasking. You are stranded on an old but rather large abandoned spaceship, heading towards Earth. But... you are not alone. Use 2 small drones. to light up the 3 devilish mobs trying to get you while having enough time to gather food and other resources. You would need to constantly keep track of all the mobs and know exactly when to move, have support or conserve energy the most. Your key goal: Survive

!!WARNING, GAME IS HARD AND REQUIRES MANY ATTEMPTS DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU ARE NOT UP FOR A CHALLENGE!!

For best experience turn sound up.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Tab to switch control of drones

press on the screen to type in commands

F1 and F2 for commands and definitions of sounds (with fn depending on computer)

ESC to pause

Bring food into the orange area to higher the hunger bar

{Coded Locks}

Left and right arrow keys to higher or lower number

Alt to switch number

Type the answer of rebus on the lock into the command line

Other type is opened by typing the correct number into the command line

Different drones for different lock colours.

Remember or write down the solution to the locks. That will really help

!!Do not rename game of Restart button will not work
